plot outline: The film is a satire on the institute of marriage in the current changing world of values. Protagonist of the film, Savitri an obsessive vegan girl who is Veterinary doctor and ardent animal lover wherein, Satyaprakash is Electrical engineer who implements solar energy projects and staunch environmentalist. Both of them are polls apart. Their families want them to get married to each other. Satyaprakash and Savitri learn that their friends who were madly in love with each other cannot succeed their marriage beyond one month. Hence Satyaprakash and Savitri takes a decision which creates chaos in their families.
title: Chi Va Chi Sau Ka
plot: Savitri, a vet and Satyaprakash, an electrical engineer are forced into marriage by their parents.

The film is a satire on the institute of marriage in the current changing world of values. Protagonist of the film, Savitri an obsessive vegan girl who is Veterinary doctor and ardent animal lover wherein, Satyaprakash is Electrical engineer who implements solar energy projects and staunch environmentalist. Both of them are polls apart. Their families want them to get married to each other. Satyaprakash and Savitri learn that their friends who were madly in love with each other cannot succeed their marriage beyond one month. Hence Satyaprakash and Savitri takes a decision which creates chaos in their families.::Bhadresh Pandav

Savitri a Vet and Satyaprakash a electrical engineer making solar projects.Both of their worlds are complete different,when their parents meet at a common friends wedding and want them to get married.Savitri and Satyaprakash realize that heir friends who were deeply in love before marriage couldn't even survive their relationship for a month.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
